summary: This is a letter from the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, providing the password for a drive containing discovery materials in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell. It is a procedural document related to evidence handling in the criminal prosecution.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case referenced in the document (United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN)). The discovery materials on the drive are pertinent to her.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: The signatory of the letter, acting as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, transmitting the password for discovery materials.

keyFacts: The document is dated October 20, 2020, during the pre-trial phase of the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.
It confirms that discovery materials pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell were being provided on a password-protected drive to the detention center.
The case is identified as United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, 20 Cr. 330 (AJN).
Audrey Strauss was the Acting United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at that time.
